CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 4, 1953 reads: "Red Cross Course Graduates - These nurse aides have completed their course in Home Nursing and Civil Defense and are prepared for attacks, man-made or natural. Mrs. Eunice W. Cook was the instructor.  Pictured, left to right: Mrs. Rachel Kane, Mrs. Elinore Tramel, Mrs. Sallie brown, Mrs. Anna Johnson, Mrs. Mary Tebch, Mrs. Elnora Allen, Mrs. Evelyn Waters, Mrs. Mabel Ford and Mrs. Bessie Powell. - Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of red cross course graduates, including Rachel Kane, Elinore Tramel, Sallie Brown, Anna Johnson, Mary Tebch, Elnora Allen, Evelyn Waters, Mabel Ford, Bessie Powell, and Eunice Cook standing in center, gathered around table with Red Cross flag in interior with sign that reads "The Red Cross Services Home Nursing, Junior Red Cross, Nutrition Service First Aid"
